ai.grakn.graql.internal.reasoner.cache

Class LazyQueryCache<Q extends ReasonerQuery>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.graql.internal.reasoner.cache.Cache<Q,LazyAnswerIterator>
      • ai.grakn.graql.internal.reasoner.cache.LazyQueryCache<Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - the type of query that is being cached

    public class LazyQueryCache<Q extends ReasonerQuery>
extends Cache<Q,LazyAnswerIterator>

    Lazy container class for storing performed query resolutions.

    Author:
    Kasper Piskorski
